replies.body:
Rp, or Riot Points, can only be bought or gifted to you by a friend who bought it for you. IP is the in-game currency you get over time just by playing the game. You can get IP in normal and ranked games, but also from co-op vs ai too!

You can check out our [Reward System Breakdown](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752824-Reward-IP-XP-System-Breakdown) for all the details on RP/IP.
your a special type of beggar arnt ya?
